channel.title: Uncategorized – End World Hunger 2045 – Endworldhunger2045.com
channel.description: End World Hunger 2045 is a foundation dedicated to helping provide those in need with life's basic necessities food, clothing, access to employment.

item.title: The End
item.dc:creator: fund.ewh2045@gmail.com
item.description:
We finished in 49 days! Thank you to everyone who helped us along the way. You enriched this journey; made it something more.

The post The End appeared first on End World Hunger 2045 - Endworldhunger2045.com.
item.content:encoded:
We finished in 49 days!

Thank you to everyone who helped us along the way. You enriched this journey; made it something more.

The post The End appeared first on End World Hunger 2045 - Endworldhunger2045.com.

item.title: Day 40 – 46
item.dc:creator: fund.ewh2045@gmail.com
item.description:
We are very close to the end now!   We have heard so many interesting stories on the way, met so many people, and learned so much about Japanese culture.

The post Day 40 – 46 appeared first on End World Hunger 2045 - Endworldhunger2045.com.
item.content:encoded:
We are very close to the end now!

 

We have heard so many interesting stories on the way,

met so many people,

and learned so much about Japanese culture.

The post Day 40 – 46 appeared first on End World Hunger 2045 - Endworldhunger2045.com.

item.title: Day 37 – 39
item.dc:creator: fund.ewh2045@gmail.com
item.description:
The past couple of days have become more restful. The rain gives us natural breaks. The rest is more pleasant after a nice, long day of walking.

The post Day 37 – 39 appeared first on End World Hunger 2045 - Endworldhunger2045.com.
item.content:encoded:
The past couple of days have become more restful.

The rain gives us natural breaks.

The rest is more pleasant after a nice, long day of walking.

The post Day 37 – 39 appeared first on End World Hunger 2045 - Endworldhunger2045.com.

item.title: Day 32 – 36
item.dc:creator: fund.ewh2045@gmail.com
item.description:
We've passed a month of walking! Half of our journey is over.      

The post Day 32 – 36 appeared first on End World Hunger 2045 - Endworldhunger2045.com.
item.content:encoded:
We’ve passed a month of walking! Half of our journey is over.

 

 

 

The post Day 32 – 36 appeared first on End World Hunger 2045 - Endworldhunger2045.com.

item.title: Day 28 – 31
item.dc:creator: fund.ewh2045@gmail.com
item.description:
Accident with our hammock. Despite these challenges we find ways to deal with it. Ryuoin temple. Thank you to the ladies that showed us around!

The post Day 28 – 31 appeared first on End World Hunger 2045 - Endworldhunger2045.com.
item.content:encoded:
Accident with our hammock. Despite these challenges we find ways to deal with it.

Ryuoin temple. Thank you to the ladies that showed us around!

The post Day 28 – 31 appeared first on End World Hunger 2045 - Endworldhunger2045.com.

item.title: Day 24 – 27
item.dc:creator: fund.ewh2045@gmail.com
item.description:
Our feet are starting to really feel it now. Made it to Ehime prefecture.   We are indebted to the kindness of others. Meeting everyone has made this trip so much nicer.

The post Day 24 – 27 appeared first on End World Hunger 2045 - Endworldhunger2045.com.
item.content:encoded:
Our feet are starting to really feel it now. Made it to Ehime prefecture.

 

We are indebted to the kindness of others. Meeting everyone has made this trip so much nicer.

The post Day 24 – 27 appeared first on End World Hunger 2045 - Endworldhunger2045.com.

item.title: Day 19 – 23
item.dc:creator: fund.ewh2045@gmail.com
item.description:
1.6 km tunnel. Kongofukaji Temple at Cape Ashizuri is our destination. Smoky, a 70 year man. His chai is the most delicious in the world. A man led us to a rest hut next to Nakasuji-gawa Dam. Another shared a sandwich with us. Thanks for your kindness!

The post Day 19 – 23 appeared first on End World Hunger 2045 - Endworldhunger2045.com.
item.content:encoded:
1.6 km tunnel. Kongofukaji Temple at Cape Ashizuri is our destination.

Smoky, a 70 year man. His chai is the most delicious in the world.

A man led us to a rest hut next to Nakasuji-gawa Dam. Another shared a sandwich with us. Thanks for your kindness!

The post Day 19 – 23 appeared first on End World Hunger 2045 - Endworldhunger2045.com.

item.title: 15-18日目
item.dc:creator: fund.ewh2045@gmail.com
item.description:
Visited Zenjibu temple. Sekkei temple. 禅師峰寺。雪蹊寺。 Iwamoto Temple. 岩戸寺。  

The post 15-18日目 appeared first on End World Hunger 2045 - Endworldhunger2045.com.
item.content:encoded:
Visited Zenjibu temple. Sekkei temple.

禅師峰寺。雪蹊寺。

Iwamoto Temple.

岩戸寺。

 

The post 15-18日目 appeared first on End World Hunger 2045 - Endworldhunger2045.com.

item.title: Day 12-14
item.dc:creator: fund.ewh2045@gmail.com
item.description:
Walking along Kochi's coastline.     Walking through Konan and Nankoku.     Making friends.  

The post Day 12-14 appeared first on End World Hunger 2045 - Endworldhunger2045.com.
item.content:encoded:
Walking along Kochi’s coastline.

 

 

Walking through Konan and Nankoku.

 

 

Making friends.

 

The post Day 12-14 appeared first on End World Hunger 2045 - Endworldhunger2045.com.

item.title: Day 11
item.dc:creator: fund.ewh2045@gmail.com
item.description:
We met a teacher! He was delighted to hear about our plans to build a school.   Nature is beautiful.  

The post Day 11 appeared first on End World Hunger 2045 - Endworldhunger2045.com.
item.content:encoded:
We met a teacher! He was delighted to hear about our plans to build a school.

 

Nature is beautiful.

 

The post Day 11 appeared first on End World Hunger 2045 - Endworldhunger2045.com.
